channel.title: Connection?
channel.description:
Uhh i dont know whats wrong! i'm running a private server, and people play and everything, but it keeps disconnecting players for no apparent reason? I see player X disconnected, then 1 second later there trying to reconnect again. And i got on and there training or just standing doing nothing, boom disconnected, then they get back on. is there anyway in which i can avoid this? or help it or something??? I'm running no other processes, just java.exe(the server) and cmd.exe. Total of 600Mb Of free Ram. and the 27 extra processes are normal for any Windows computer. is there any way i can make my connection better, stable in this case?!?! help will be much appreciated thanks!
anthony is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Game saved for player hejsa ClientHandler: Client hejsa disconnected. Game saved for player beano kid ClientHandler: Client beano kid disconnected. [client-5-akl]: Case 185: Action Button: 165 [client-5-akl]: Case 185: Action Button: 165 Game saved for player jddogg9 ClientHandler: Client jddogg9 disconnected. Game saved for player god ClientHandler: Client god disconnected. [client-17-i ownz i]: playerCommand: commands Game saved for player estmagic ClientHandler: Client estmagic disconnected. [client-2-i love you]: playerCommand: food [client-5-akl]: playerCommand: shop [client-14-anthony]: playerCommand: commands Game saved for player buddina ClientHandler: Client buddina disconnected.

item.title: Connection?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Thanks. I restart the server every 20 minutes or so. I have to get some admins on there to help me, because usually i’m not on, i’m watching t.v or something. Well thanks anyways appreciate it!

Read full topic

item.title: Connection?
item.dc:creator: @djmanobby djmanobby
item.description:
@djmanobby wrote:

Yw, shame it didn’t work. Good luck, Another soultion it could be to stressful for your computer. Try restarting your server every 30mins or so to help reduce lag from massers.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“djmanobby, post:2, topic:141294”]IN playerhandler.java find this

public static final int maxPlayers = 200;
public static Player players[] = new Player[maxPlayers];

Change Max players to the appropriate.[/quote]

I already tried that, changed it to 21. even went as far as going to server.java and changing max connections to 25.

Thanks though

Read full topic

item.title: Connection?
item.dc:creator: @djmanobby djmanobby
item.description:
@djmanobby wrote:

IN playerhandler.java find this

public static final int maxPlayers =

Change Max players to the appropriate (there will be a number after that line).

Read full topic

item.title: Connection?

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Uhh i dont know whats wrong! i’m running a private server, and people play and everything, but it keeps disconnecting players for no apparent reason?

I see player X disconnected, then 1 second later there trying to reconnect again. And i got on and there training or just standing doing nothing, boom disconnected, then they get back on.

is there anyway in which i can avoid this? or help it or something??? I’m running no other processes, just java.exe(the server) and cmd.exe. Total of 600Mb Of free Ram. and the 27 extra processes are normal for any Windows computer.

is there any way i can make my connection better, stable in this case?!?! help will be much appreciated thanks!
